name: Re-Shape me
description:
kevin lost his body...

all he have now is a soul inside a cube
in this short journey
help him find his body plz :'(

link to the game will be available tomorrow... ( i hope so xD )

Update : ok finally i got some times to work onthe game :'(
literally all i had is today
from 11:00 until now 22:23
(only 30 min to upload the game waiting for it to be exported xD)
i couldn't make the UI or design better
just basic stuff
hope you give it a try guys

i will update the game later of course and make more playable and responsive

for now think about as a prototype
